news.title: Merlin Group plans to invest Rs 2,000 crore in Pune in next five years
news.para: "We have plans to invest Rs 2,000 crore with ambitious projects over the next five years in the second-largest city of Maharashtra", Merlin Group managing director Saket Mohta said.

news.title: Assam cabinet decides to exempt ex-servicemen/widows from paying property tax
news.para: As a gesture of gratitude to Ex-servicemen for their service to the nation, amendment billls for Guwahati Municipal Corporation Act, 1969 and Assam Municipal Act, 1956 to be tabled to exempt Ex-servicemen/widows from paying property tax

news.title: Lucknow: Rs 116 crore assets of real estate firm attached
news.para: The first FIR against director of the firm Paresh Rastogi was lodged in 2018 at Hazratganj police station followed by 81 other FIRs in different police stations of the city.

news.title: Chandigarh housing board to conduct survey of 17,000 slum rehab flats
news.para: CHB chief executive officer (CEO) Yashpal Garg said that the board has allotted about 17,000 flats under rehabilitation scheme/small flat and affordable rental housing scheme.

news.title: Rajasthan plans more relaxations for unregularised colonies
news.para: Now, colonies developed on government acquired land will be regularised by the urban local bodies during the campaign, which is scheduled to restart from July 15.

news.title: Chandigarh: No conversion from leasehold to freehold on GPA
news.para: ​​As per the latest order issued by the finance department, Rule 8 in the “The Chandigarh Conversion of Residential leasehold land tenure into freehold tenure Rules 1996” have been deleted.

news.title: Demonetization not a 'force majeure' event: MahaRERA
news.para: The complainants said the developer had delayed handing over the possession of the flat despite the six months’ grace period. The developer said the delay was caused by the demonetization.

news.title: No EV charging station? Noida authority won't approve building plans from now
news.para: Ahmad said the new rule would be applicable to all types of infrastructure projects — residential, commercial or industrial. This is the 8th time, according to him, that the Noida building manual was approved.

news.title: Gurugram: DTCP seals 58 flats in Palam Vihar for building norms violation
news.para: The department has also written to the Gurgaon police for registering FIRs against the errant property owners under the Haryana Development and Regulation of Urban Areas Act, 1975.

news.title: CAG flags 'poor utilisation' of construction workers welfare fund in Delhi
news.para: The Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers' Welfare Board was constituted in September 2002 to collect cess and utilise the same for providing social security, health care, etc. to construction workers in Delhi.

news.title: Delhi lacked 'plan' to provide water, sewer facilities in unauthorised colonies between 2013-18: CAG
news.para: ​In the "absence of a strategic plan", only 353 and 126 unauthorised colonies were provided piped water supply and sewerage facilities respectively during this period, said the report tabled in the Delhi Assembly on Tuesday.

news.title: Affordable housing scheme failed in Delhi due to lack of planning: CAG report
news.para: The review of affordable housing projects for urban poor under Jawaharlal Nehru National Urban Renewal Mission was one of the components of CAG’s performance audit of various Delhi government departments.

news.title: New TDR policy on the anvil for Bengaluru
news.para: On Tuesday, chief minister Basavaraj Bommai held a detailed meeting with the urban development department (UDD) and it's minister Byrathi Basavaraju to discuss the possible measures to be taken on the TDR issue.

news.title: Cidco, AAI to soon set height cap for projects near New Mumbai Airport
news.para: A meeting scheduled in the next two weeks is expected to provide guidance on the matter that has impacted projects in the city for the last six months, people aware of the development told ET.

news.title: ABIL group chairman's custody extended till July 11; ED says he illegally got Rs 431 crore
news.para: The contention of the ED in the previous remand was that Yes Bank disbursed Rs 3,983 crore to DHFL, which then diverted Rs 2317 crore to Radius Group of Sanjay Chhabria, who in turn gave Rs 267 crore to Nibodh Realty LLP of Bhosale.
